issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: The comment of class INodeId is misleading. In the comment, Id 1 to 1000 are reserved for potential future usage, but code\{{public static final long LAST_RESERVED_ID = 2 << 14 - 1}} will result 1 to 16384 are reserved. At the same time , operator '-' priority is higher than '<<', {{2 << 14 - 1}} is not equal to {{(2 <<14) - 1}}.
fields.summary: INodeId's LAST_RESERVED_ID may not as expected and the comment is misleading
